description._content: Grandpa McKay, Ebenezer McKay [between 1890 and 1900?] 1 photograph on carte de visite mount in album page : carte de visite tintype ; 12.9 x 10.3 cm (page) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Probably Ebenezer McKay of Michigan, born Feb. 19, 1833, died Jan. 3, 1920. Relates to LOT 14043-2, no. 32. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: McKay, Ebenezer,--1833-1920. Men--1890-1900. Older people--1890-1900. Format: Portrait photographs--1890-1900. Tintypes--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34998 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3079
